documents.document: Must say, @AndrewLittleMP sounds more and more like a leader these days.

@netflix show descriptions are terrible.

@karlwkane commanding officer told me he had to shout morning tea for the squad cos he got it wrong.
@danserif turns out the previous person who lived here isn't your model citizen. He also continues to give this as his address.

@meganhuddleston paving the way for the generations of tomorrow.

@meganhuddleston I could never do it - I was too tall. Other kids would laugh at me for my head touching the ground.
@meganhuddleston wet bars are a bitch.
